entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
